channel.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
channel.description:
Logitech Shop is having a sale, G19s are only $139 AUD
[url]https://www.logitechshop.com.au/products/Logitech-G19-Gaming-Keyboard.html[/url]
Decisions, decisions
:fffuuu:

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: Coolm4n
item.description:
Jingles:

Is a normal keyboard not enough?

Not for a hardcore gamer/geek.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Logitech G19?

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: Spriter-San
item.description:
I use the Logitech G13 Advanced Gameboard with my gimmicky HP VoodooDNA Gaming Keyboard, and I have to say, it rocks. Although the G19 has a Color LCD screen, I still prefer the G13 and my keyboard over it.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Logitech G19?

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
The Minotaur:

That was probably one of the worse analogies you could have thought up. Cars totally deserve new stuff on them, keyboards do not.

Nope, as long as it gets me to where i wanna go i don’t care what’s in it and/or on it.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Logitech G19?

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
I’m happy with my G15. But then again, how could I not be? I got it for thirty bucks.

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: The_Minotaur
item.description:
Deimos:

I ask the same question as long as a car gets A to B why pay any extra on a new car? if you don’t want to buy a new keyboard this is probably the wrong thread.

That was probably one of the worse analogies you could have thought up. Cars totally deserve new stuff on them, keyboards do not.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Logitech G19?

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: hercule_poirots_nuts
item.description:
pick keyboards based on how many cups of coffee you can pour in there before it dies. i bet all those lights and shit only make it fail my test faster

item.source: Should I buy a Logitech G19?

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
Jingles:

I game on my PC and my keyboard is fine? What exactly is so good about having programmable keys, a backlit keyboard and LCD screen that is worth paying an extra £100 for?

I ask the same question as long as a car gets A to B why pay any extra on a new car? if you don’t want to buy a new keyboard this is probably the wrong thread.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Logitech G19?

item.source: Should I buy a Logitech G19?

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
2 monitors for games? BWAHAHAHAHAHA! I hope you like having the empty space in the middle of your view! it’s at least 3 screens for games. BTW, I don’t need to check my temps while I’m playing because I’ve got a huge aftermarket cooler on my GPU and CPU.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Logitech G19?

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
sersoft:

I have rivatuner as well, I can see the temp and fan speed in real time on my 2nd monitor if I wanted to.

I don’t have a second monitor and if I had I wouldn’t use it for that.
I need to know the temps in-game and in realtime and with a second monitor the game would be on both monitors and then I would still need the little LCD

Read full topic

item.title: Should I buy a Logitech G19?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Why do you need a glowing backlit keyboard? You can’t touch type? And why pay extra for the lcd? With dual screens you don’t need a tiny third one on your keyboard.

Read full topic
